IP_SYN_2_style_3:
Service: Total Lung Lavage (32997).
Side: Unilateral (Left).
Technique: Double-lumen endotracheal tube placement with bronchoscopic confirmation (bundled). Instillation of 8 liters of saline with gravity drainage and chest physiotherapy until effluent cleared.
Indication: Pulmonary Alveolar Proteinosis.
